meanings.definition: A formal agreement to get married.
meanings.sent1: Their engagements were announced in the local newspaper.
meanings.sent2: She eagerly accepted his proposal of marriage and they set their engagement date.
meanings.sent3: The engagement ring slipped off her finger and rolled into the cake at the party.
meanings.sent4: Their love was a fortress, with their engagement as the sturdy gate.
meanings.sent5: The engagement party was a joyful celebration of their commitment.

meanings.definition: A meeting or appointment arranged in advance.
meanings.sent1: I have important business engagements scheduled for tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She had to reschedule her dental engagement due to a sudden illness.
meanings.sent3: The engagement with the client went smoothly, sealing the deal.
meanings.sent4: Their engagement at the coffee shop turned into a deep conversation about life.
meanings.sent5: The engagement with the professor clarified all the doubts about the assignment.

meanings.sent1: The soldiers prepared for the upcoming engagements in the war.
meanings.sent2: The engagement between the two armies lasted for days.
meanings.sent3: The engagement on the battlefield was fierce and intense.
meanings.sent4: Their engagement in the final battle determined the outcome of the war.
meanings.sent5: The engagement with the enemy forces required strategic planning and courage.
